about_the_game:
Game Overview

Left to Float is a sci-fi themed exploration game where you traverse a dilapidated vessel attempting to escape. You're equipped with a jetpack and magnetic boots to aid in maneuvering in zero g throughout the various rooms as well as to help with solving puzzles. You'll also want that jetpack to quickly get away from the thing hunting you.

Your mission was supposed to be a short, solo one; a year at most. But two years in space later, with no hope of rescue in sight, supplies have long run out. Strange noises can be heard in the bowels of the vessel, and odd things keep happening; Is it the hunger or something much worse?

Alone, you must rely on your puzzle solving skills and quick thinking to survive. Utilize your jet pack to escape danger and reach new locations. In zero g your momentum is maintained across distances so use this to your advantage!

Uncover numerous diaries and notes to reveal the history of the vessel and the dark nature of your enemies! Unlock passageways by discovering enough of these diaries and notes. With your supplies having run out and no rescue coming, you will have to find your own way home.

Key Features

  • Explore a dark and dreary space station.

  • Avoid the mysterious entity hunting you.

  • Investigate notes and odd occurrences in order to unlock new passages.

  • Find a way to escape your fate.

  • Discover the secrets of the dark vessel.

  • Zero G maneuvering.

  • Magnetic boots to keep you grounded in space.

  • Use your jet pack for fast escapes and exploring tough to reach locations.
